```{r read and tidy}
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
list.files()
sheets <- readxl::excel_sheets("20190610_H292_apoA_olmA.xlsx")
data_raw <- list()
i <-sheets[1]
for(i in sheets){
  sheet.i <- readxl::read_xlsx("20190610_H292_apoA_olmA.xlsx", sheet = i, n_max = 8)[-1]
  data_raw[[i]] <- 
    sheet.i %>%
    mutate(row = LETTERS[1:8]) %>%
    dplyr::select(row, everything()) %>%
    gather(column, abs, -row) %>%
    mutate(sheet = i) %>%
    separate(sheet, c("cell_line", "sugar"), sep = "_")
}


data_bound <- bind_rows(data_raw)
doses.lut <- bind_rows(  
  tibble(column = 1:12, dose = c(((sqrt(10)) / sqrt(10)^(0:9)), 0, NA))
)


lut <- as_tibble(expand.grid(row = LETTERS[1:8], column  = 1:12)) %>%
  left_join(tibble(row = LETTERS[1:8], compound = rep(c("Apoptolidin A", "Oligomycin A"), each = 4)))  %>%
  left_join(doses.lut) %>%
  mutate(column = as.character(column))

doses.lut
data_tidy <- data_bound %>%
  left_join(lut)

data_bound
sugar.lut <- 
  tibble(sugar = c("Dex", "Gal"),
         sugar_long = c("Glucose - 2mM", "Galactose - 10 mM"))
data_tidy
background <- data_tidy %>%
  dplyr::filter(is.na(dose)) %>%
  group_by(sugar) %>%
  summarise(abs.background = median(abs))

vehicle <- data_tidy%>%
  dplyr::filter(dose == 0) %>%
  group_by(sugar) %>%
  left_join(background) %>%
  mutate(abs_norm = abs - abs.background) %>%
  summarise(abs_norm_veh = median(abs_norm))

crc.data <- data_tidy%>%
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(dose), dose != 0) %>%
  left_join(background) %>%
  mutate(abs_norm = abs-abs.background) %>%
  left_join(vehicle) %>%
  mutate(abs_norm = abs_norm/abs_norm_veh) %>%
  mutate(dose = dose/1e6)

crc.data
library(drc)
apoA.drc <- drm(abs_norm~dose, sugar_long, data = crc.data %>%
      filter(compound == "Apoptolidin A") %>%
        left_join(sugar.lut) %>%
        mutate(dose = dose*1e9), fct = LL.4())
apoA.drc
drc::ED(apoA.drc, 10)
apoA.drc
```

```{r}
crc.data
crc.prediction.list <- list()
crc.model.list <- list()
crc.data <- crc.data %>%
  unite("Conditions", compound, sugar, remove = F)


library(drc)
crc.data

i <- unique(crc.data$Conditions)[[3]]
for(i in unique(crc.data$Conditions)) {
  mydata <- crc.data %>%
    dplyr::filter(Conditions == i)
  crc.model <- drm(abs_norm ~ dose, data = mydata, fct = LL.4())
  crc.model.list[[i]] <- summary(crc.model)
  new.doses <- expand.grid(dose=exp(seq(log(min(mydata$dose)),
                                         log(max(mydata$dose)),
                                         length=100)))
  new.response <- predict(crc.model, new.doses, interval="none")
  crc.prediction.list[[i]] <- data.frame(Doses = new.doses,
                                         abs_norm = new.response,
                                         Conditions = i)
}

drc::ED(crc.model, 65)

?drc::ED
ic50s  <- as_tibble(lapply(crc.model.list, function(df) df$coefficients[4,1:2])) %>%
  bind_cols(Stat = c("estimate", "std.err")) %>%
  gather(Conditions, IC50, -Stat) %>%
  spread(Stat, IC50) %>%
  mutate(estimate.lab = round(estimate, 2), 
         std.err = round(std.err*1.96, 2)) %>%
  mutate(label = paste0("IC50 (nM):\n",
                        estimate.lab, " Â± ", std.err))
```
